level.heading: Service of process.
level.text: The Trust Fund shall maintain a designated agent to accept service of process for the Trust Fund. Notice to or service upon the agent is notice or service upon the Trust Fund.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 4-1341.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-1341.01.
